name: Ultimate Desktop Character Engine
description: With UDCE, you can liven up your character and place it on the desktop, on any window or under it. But UDCE is much more than just a model on your desktop! Dancing, mini-games, customization, management and much more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: intel Core 2 Duo or similar AMD Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Aero must be enabled on Windows 7. On some x32 OS, the application may not work correctly. Needed: .net framework 4.5+, Visual c++
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (x64) Processor: intel Core i5+ or similar AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Aero must be enabled on Windows 7. On some x32 OS, the application may not work correctly. Needed: .net framework 4.5+, Visual c++
